name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Dennis GAFFNEY, Petitioner
docket_number: Petition No. 955 Middle District Allocatur Docket 1997

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Dennis GAFFNEY, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 8TH day of MAY, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED but LIMITED to the following:
Was the sentence illegal in that the Petitioner was sentenced to register with the Pennsylvania State Police pursuant to 42 Pa.C.S. § 9793, but said act was not effective at the time of the commission of the offenses to which Petitioner pled guilty?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
710 A.2d 605
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Dennis GAFFNEY, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 8, 1998.
